title: Looking for players, AU.
body:
Hey, searching for players to team up with as a majority of random players we get teamed with are terrible.
Currently play duo queue with PimpFortWenny, he plays Mid and I play Jungle, TMCD is my tag.

We are both Bronze 5 and are finding it impossible to climb. We take the game seriously and both feel like we are better than Bronze players.

We both have mic's and play most nights. If you're keen to team up please add us and hopefully we can climb some ranks :)

replies.body:
Yo dude(s), Im keen to hit up some ranked with you. lets play tonight! 
add me on league, Jewency is my tag.
i have Curse and TS3 for comms!

I assure you, bad teammates aren't stopping you from climbing out of Bronze V.

Add me, Jonius7, currently in Bronze I.
hey name is smee007 :D, I am a gold 5 sup player
hey man im in the same boat always getting trolls its so frustrating. add me
Im gold 2 although would love 2 play some norms :3 I was in ur position not 2 long ago, hope it works out man :)
Hello there! I'm a top lane main who plays a ton of {{champion:122}} , add me if your interested!
